title: MIP 1 - Purchase and Sale of Bitcoin and Ethereum from OnJuno Checking Account
body:
MIP: 1
Title: Purchase and Sale of Bitcoin and Ethereum from OnJuno Checking Account.
Status: Proposed
Author: @Swam | ETH Maxi 
Created: 27 Sep 2021

Simple Summary
The ability for users to purchase Bitcoin and Ethereum directly from their checking account, thereby eliminating the need to move funds manually from a bank account to an exchange wallet.

Motivation/Purpose
Currently, there are 2 points of friction:

(a) Inability to Buy/Sell directly from Checking Account - Even though crypto has become a $2 Billion industry, banks don't provide a way to buy crypto directly from the checking account, leading to users having to move their money from a bank account to an exchange wallet. OnJuno can reduce this friction and allows users to buy and sell the top 2 crypto-currencies (by Market Cap) directly from OnJuno Checking Account itself.

(b) High Fees charged by Exchanges for on-ramp - Coinbase has a history of charging high fees (2-4%) as there isn't much competition from other centralized exchanges. OnJuno can reduce the trading fees, ensuring that the customer gets a fair deal while simultaneously allowing OnJuno to be profitable and sustainable.

Eg: https://help.coinbase.com/en/coinbase/trading-and-funding/pricing-and-fees/fees

3 Step Test

Step 1: Compliance Check - Both Bitcoin & Ethereum have regulatory approval in the US. The U.S. Treasury classified bitcoin as a convertible decentralized virtual currency in 2013.

Source: https://www.fincen.gov/news/testimony/statement-jennifer-shasky-calvery-director-financial-crimes-enforcement-network

Step 2. Strategic/Ops - A fair fee of 0.95% is proposed. Additionally, for Early Access users, OnJuno will provide Free trading of Bitcoin and Ethereum till Dec 31, 2021 as a promotional scheme.

Step 3. Product - High Priority
author: 0xA7E0c7EdF9A81fdcd2c99A056AC42C60B1333D95
